objective statement.S: Dependable and self-motivated professional with over five years experience in high-pressure office environment offering banking services. Seeking to start a career in cloud computing to work alongside a diverse team to design and implement comprehensive cloud solutions that align with business needs, considering scalability, security and performance. Analytical thinker and problem solver with proven ability to evaluate challenges and make decisions.

name.S: Knowledge of programming languages (Python, JavaScript, CSS, Bash, SQL)
IBM IT Project Manager Professional Certificate

summary.S: Building cloud projects on AWS infrstructure

L.S: Working on AWS Solutions Architect-Associate projects

summary.S: Performed financial and general interviews to the Chief Finance Officers and Managing Directors/ Chief Executive Officers, respectively, of over 30 mid-sized companies in Kenya.

position.S: Deputy Presiding Officer and Presiding Officer

summary.S: Managed and oversaw all aspects of the election in the assigned polling station with 700 voters.

L.S: Physically and system verified over 20 accounts opened daily together with the accompanying documentations to ensure accurate data capture and 100% compliance to policies and procedures.

Sold Equitel lines to all customers who opened accounts and effectively demonstrated usage to customers to ensure all new accounts were 100% on mobile banking and at least 95% of SIM cards issued were active.
Maintained records of materials in inventory and on order. Monitored reorder points and initiated action to replenish stock. I also reconciled discrepancies in inventory and reported irregularities.
Timely resolved over 20 ATM transaction desputes and cash differences on a daily basis.
Received ATM card applications from at least 30 customers daily and instantly printed the cards on verification of the customers’ identity.
Promptly opened at least 30 customer accounts daily upon receiving and confirmation of the required account opening documents.
Received and accurately deposited at least 150 customers’ cheques and funds transfer requests upon verification of the details.
Promptly Replenished ATM cash on a daily basis for 3 ATM machines including weekends and holidays, to ensure the machines were functional throughout and that no customers were stranded.

description.S: A project where you will have the opportunity to build and deploy a serverless API using different Cloud providers (of your choice), integrated with GitHub Actions for CI/CD. The primary goal? Construct an API that can serve resume data in JSON format.
